channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Battle-Scarred Johnson Issued Ultimatum: ‘Start Taking Extraordinary Measures’
WATCH: "Santa" helps save Christmas at 2 a.m. after mom is missing keyboard
item.description: Marisa Shumaker went to assemble her daughter's keyboard as a gift only to realize it was just a stand. With only a few hours left until Christmas mor...

item.title: Winning ticket for $1.22 billion lottery jackpot sold in California, Mega Millions says
item.description: At least one Mega Millions player has plenty of dough to ring in the New Year after drawing the winning number.

item.title: California store sells winning $1.22 billion Mega Millions ticket
item.description: One lucky ticket sold in Northern California won an estimated $1.22 billion jackpot in Friday's Mega Millions drawing just days before the new year.

item.title: Winning numbers drawn for estimated $1.22 billion Mega Millions jackpot
item.description: A winner of the Mega Millions jackpot could either take the cash payout of $549.7 million or the $1.22 billion annuity paid out over 30 years.

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to delay TikTok sale deadline
item.description: Two weeks before the Supreme Court is set to hear oral arguments over TikTok's future, President-elect Donald Trump has asked the justices to delay a ...

item.title: Greg Gumbel, CBS Sports broadcasting legend, dies at 78
item.description: Greg Gumbel, the renowned CBS Sports anchor and commentator, has died of cancer at the age of 78.

item.title: 12/27: CBS Evening News
item.description: CBS Sports broadcasting legend Greg Gumbel dies at 78; Nurse adopts teen mom after caring for babies in NICU

item.description: The Supreme Court will hear arguments Jan. 10 in TikTok's challenge of a law that could lead to a ban of the widely popular platform.
